name: Cade's Team Fusion
description:
Cade's Team Fusion is a 2v2 top-down shooter that unifies the characters of every project I've ever worked on. Essentially, it's the dumbest Capture the Flag game you'll ever play.

Each character has four abilities that can be unlocked and upgraded by getting kills and capturing flags. New characters will be added over time.

The game comes equipped with LAN multiplayer, but you can also play against bots offline.
